resources.string: Our pickup arrives at your door step
First and common service is you can book a pick up truck for your area with just basic details
Clean your area with just one click
If you find a area with garbage just opn application and take photo and upload we will clean it as soon as possible
Book Dustbin just by request us
If any public place or hospital don\'t have a proper dustbin then just request us we will provide you a dustbin
